decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: 21026-GAA-ZZ-00-DR-T-0111 Location & Block Plan; 21026-GAA-XX-GF-DR-T-0307 Existing Ground Floor Plan; 21026-GAA-XX-01-DR-T-0308 Existing First Floor Plan; 21026-GAA-XX-02-DR-T-0309 Existing Second Floor Plan; 21026-GAA-XX-RF-DR-T-0310 Existing Roof Plan; 21026-GAA-XX-ZZ-DR-T-0315 Existing Elevations; 21026-GAA-XX-ZZ-DR-T-0316 Existing Elevations 2; 21026-GAA-XX-GF-DR-T-2005 Proposed Ground Floor Plan; 21026-GAA-XX-01-DR-T-2006 Proposed First Floor Plan; 21026-GAA-XX-02-DR-T-2007 Proposed Second Floor Plan; 21026-GAA-XX-RF-DR-T-2012 Proposed Roof Plan; 21026-GAA-XX-ZZ-DR-T-2103 Proposed Elevations; 21026-GAA-XX-ZZ-DR-T-2104 Proposed Elevations 2.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Plan Document (2013). | No part of the flat roofs of the proposed dwellinghouse shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policies D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Single storey rear extension; conversion of a garage into a habitable room including associated external alteration involving the insertion and relocation of entrance door and ground floor windows to front elevation
